ComicInfo.Series: Dark Tower: The Gunslinger - The Journey Begins
ComicInfo.Summary:
Well, gentle reader, we find ourselves at the end of one road that only leads on to another. But our Roland is no mere passer-by, do ya kennit? Passing through the town of Kingston in his pursuit of the Man in Black has turned into quite the ordeal - the girl Susan (an echo of his true love, named Delgado) kidnapped and taken to a Dogan of the Old People, where the secrets of the invisible Not-Men are kept. It will be a battle of the mysterious tech of long ago versus the cold hard steel of the Gunslinger. It is a fate to be decided by the hands of Gan, the hands of ka, and these hands know no mercy.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-02-14 12:50:52. [CVDB235728]
